verses.verse: וַיָּ֡קָם <WH6965> rose up אֶלְיָשִׁיב֩ <WH475> Then Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> the high וְאֶחָ֣יו <WH251> with his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> the priests וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> and they builded אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> the sheep הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <WH6942> they sanctified וַֽיַּעֲמִ֖ידוּ <WH5975> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֑יו <WH1817> the doors וְעַד־ <WH5704> against מִגְדַּ֤ל <WH4026> of it even unto the tower הַמֵּאָה֙ <WH3968> of Meah קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <WH6942> they sanctified עַ֖ד <WH5704> against מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> it unto the tower חֲנַנְאֵֽל׃ <WH2606> of Hananeel ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> And next unto him בָנ֖וּ <WH1129> builded אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> the men יְרֵח֑וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho ס וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> Next בָנָ֔ה <WH1129> And next to them builded זַכּ֖וּר <WH2139> Zaccur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִמְרִֽי׃ <WH566> of Imri ס

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <WH1709> But the fish בָּנ֖וּ <WH1129> build בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> did the sons הַסְּנָאָ֑ה <WH5570> of Hassenaah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they קֵר֔וּהוּ <WH7136> who [also] laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> the doors מַנְעוּלָ֖יו <WH4514> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> thereof and the bars ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> repaired מְרֵמ֤וֹת <WH4822> Meremoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִיָּה֙ <WH223> of Urijah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַקּ֔וֹץ <WH6976> of Koz ס וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> repaired מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖ה <WH1296> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֑ל <WH4898> of Meshezabeel ס וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶֽחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> repaired צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> Zadok בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son בַּעֲנָֽא׃ <WH1195> of Baana ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדָ֖ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> repaired הַתְּקוֹעִ֑ים <WH8621> the Tekoites וְאַדִּֽירֵיהֶם֙ <WH117> but their nobles לֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> put צַוָּרָ֔ם <WH6677> not their necks בַּעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> to the work אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH113> of their Lord ס

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate הַיְשָׁנָ֜ה <WH3465> Moreover the old הֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <WH2388> repaired יֽוֹיָדָע֙ <WH3111> Jehoiada בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פָּסֵ֔חַ <WH6454> of Paseah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> and Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּסֽוֹדְיָ֑ה <WH1152> of Besodeiah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they קֵר֔וּהוּ <WH7136> they laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> the doors וּמַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> thereof and the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> thereof and the bars ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדָ֨ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֜יק <WH2388> repaired מְלַטְיָ֣ה <WH4424> Melatiah הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗י <WH1393> the Gibeonite וְיָדוֹן֙ <WH3036> and Jadon הַמֵּרֹ֣נֹתִ֔י <WH4824> the Meronothite אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men גִבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> and of Mizpah לְכִסֵּ֕א <WH3678> unto the throne פַּחַ֖ת <WH6346> of the governor עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַנָּהָֽר׃ <WH5104> the river ס

עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> repaired עֻזִּיאֵ֤ל <WH5816> Uzziel בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son חַרְהֲיָה֙ <WH2736> of Harhaiah צֽוֹרְפִ֔ים <WH6884> of the goldsmiths ס וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> also repaired חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <WH2608> Hananiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הָרַקָּחִ֑ים <WH7546> of [one of] the apothecaries וַיַּֽעַזְבוּ֙ <WH5800> and they fortified יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem עַ֖ד <WH5704> far הַחוֹמָ֥ה <WH2346> wall הָרְחָבָֽה׃ <WH7342> unto the broad ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> Next יָדָ֤ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> repaired רְפָיָ֣ה <WH7509> Rephaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ח֔וּר <WH2354> of Hur שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> part יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדָ֧ם <WH3027> And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֛יק <WH2388> repaired יְדָיָ֥ה <WH3042> Jedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חֲרוּמַ֖ף <WH2739> of Harumaph וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> opposite בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> even over against his house ס וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> repaired חַטּ֖וּשׁ <WH2407> Hattush בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲשַׁבְנְיָֽה׃ <WH2813> of Hashabniah

מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> piece שֵׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> the other הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <WH4441> Malchijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> of Harim וְחַשּׁ֖וּב <WH2815> and Hashub בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פַּחַ֣ת מוֹאָ֑ב <WH6355> of Pahathmoab וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> and the tower הַתַּנּוּרִֽים׃ <WH8574> of the furnaces ס

וְעַל־ <WH5921> Next יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> repaired שַׁלּוּם֙ <WH7967> Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַלּוֹחֵ֔שׁ <WH3873> of Halohesh שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> part יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּבְנוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1323> he and his daughters ס

אֵת֩ <WH853> שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate הַגַּ֜יְא <WH1516> The valley הֶחֱזִ֣יק <WH2388> repaired חָנוּן֮ <WH2586> Hanun וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants זָנוֹחַ֒ <WH2182> of Zanoah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> They בָנ֔וּהוּ <WH1129> they built וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> thereof and the bars וְאֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thereof and a thousand אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits בַּחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> on the wall עַ֖ד <WH5704> against שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הָשֲׁפֽוֹת׃ <WH830> unto the dung

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הָאַשְׁפּ֗וֹת <WH830> But the dung הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <WH4441> Malchiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָ֔ב <WH7394> of Rechab שַׂ֖ר <WH8269> the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> of part בֵּית־ הַכָּ֑רֶם <WH1021> of Bethhaccerem ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יִבְנֶ֔נּוּ <WH1129> he built וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <WH5975> it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> thereof and the bars ס

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> But the gate הָעַ֜יִן <WH5869> of the fountain הֶ֠חֱזִיק <WH2388> repaired שַׁלּ֣וּן <WH7968> Shallun בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כָּל־ חֹזֶה֮ <WH3626> of Colhozeh שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> of part הַמִּצְפָּה֒ <WH4709> of Mizpah ה֤וּא <WH1931> He יִבְנֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH1129> he built וִיטַֽלְלֶ֔נּוּ <WH2926> it and covered [וְיַעֲמִידוּ כ] (וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <WH5975> abide ק) דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> thereof and the bars וְ֠אֵת <WH853> חוֹמַ֞ת <WH2346> thereof and the wall בְּרֵכַ֤ת <WH1295> of the pool הַשֶּׁ֙לַח֙ <WH7975> of Siloah לְגַן־ <WH1588> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king's וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַֽמַּעֲל֔וֹת <WH4609> and unto the stairs הַיּוֹרְד֖וֹת <WH3381> that go down מֵעִ֥יר <WH5892> from the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David ס

אַחֲרָ֤יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> him repaired נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <WH5166> Nehemiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עַזְבּ֔וּק <WH5802> of Azbuk שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> part בֵּֽית־ צ֑וּר <WH1049> of Bethzur עַד־ <WH5704> far נֶ֙גֶד֙ <WH5048> opposite קִבְרֵ֣י <WH6913> unto [the place] over against the sepulchres דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַבְּרֵכָה֙ <WH1295> and to the pool הָעֲשׂוּיָ֔ה <WH6213> that was made וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> far בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and unto the house הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> of the mighty ס

אַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֥יקוּ <WH2388> him repaired הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> the Levites רְח֣וּם <WH7348> Rehum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בָּנִ֑י <WH1137> of Bani עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> repaired חֲשַׁבְיָ֛ה <WH2811> Hashabiah שַׂר־ <WH8269> the ruler חֲצִי־ <WH2677> of the half פֶ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> part קְעִילָ֖ה <WH7084> of Keilah לְפִלְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH6418> in his part ס

אַחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> him repaired אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> their brethren בַּוַּ֖י <WH942> Bavai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵנָדָ֑ד <WH2582> of Henadad שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> part קְעִילָֽה׃ <WH7084> of Keilah ס

וַיְחַזֵּ֨ק <WH2388> repaired עַל־ <WH5921> Next יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> And next to him עֵ֧זֶר <WH5829> Ezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֵשׁ֛וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> the ruler הַמִּצְפָּ֖ה <WH4709> of Mizpah מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> piece שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> another מִנֶּ֕גֶד <WH5048> front עֲלֹ֥ת <WH5927> over against the going up הַנֶּ֖שֶׁק <WH5402> to the armoury הַמִּקְצֹֽעַ׃ <WH4740> at the turning ס

אַחֲרָ֨יו <WH310> After הֶחֱרָ֧ה <WH2734> earnestly הֶחֱזִ֛יק <WH2388> repaired בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1263> him Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [זַבַּי כ] (זַכַּ֖י <WH2079> Zabbai ק) מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> piece שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> the other מִן־ <WH4480> from הַ֨מִּקְצ֔וֹעַ <WH4740> from the turning עַד־ <WH5704> against פֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> [of the wall] unto the door בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֶלְיָשִׁ֔יב <WH475> of Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> the high ס

אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> him repaired מְרֵמ֧וֹת <WH4822> Meremoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִיָּ֛ה <WH223> of Urijah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַקּ֖וֹץ <WH6976> of Koz מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> piece שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> another מִפֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> from the door בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֶלְיָשִׁ֔יב <WH475> of Eliashib וְעַד־ <WH5704> far תַּכְלִ֖ית <WH8503> even to the end בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אֶלְיָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH475> of Eliashib ס
וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> And after הֶחֱזִ֥יקוּ <WH2388> him repaired הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men הַכִּכָּֽר׃ <WH3603> of the plain

אַחֲרָ֨יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֧יק <WH2388> him repaired בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> Benjamin וְחַשּׁ֖וּב <WH2815> and Hashub נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> front בֵּיתָ֑ם <WH1004> over against their house ס אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> him repaired עֲזַרְיָ֧ה <WH5838> Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <WH4641> of Maaseiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲנָֽנְיָ֖ה <WH6055> of Ananiah אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> by בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> his house ס

אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> After הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> him repaired בִּנּ֛וּי <WH1131> Binnui בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֵנָדָ֖ד <WH2582> of Henadad מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> piece שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> another מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house עֲזַרְיָ֔ה <WH5838> of Azariah עַד־ <WH5704> far הַמִּקְצ֖וֹעַ <WH4740> unto the turning וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַפִּנָּֽה׃ <WH6438> [of the wall] even unto the corner

פָּלָ֣ל <WH6420> Palal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּזַי֮ <WH186> of Uzai מִנֶּ֣גֶד <WH5048> front הַמִּקְצוֹעַ֒ <WH4740> over against the turning וְהַמִּגְדָּ֗ל <WH4026> [of the wall] and the tower הַיּוֹצֵא֙ <WH3318> which lieth out מִבֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> from the king's הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> high אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לַחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> that [was] by the court הַמַּטָּרָ֑ה <WH4307> of the prison אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> After פְּדָיָ֥ה <WH6305> him Pedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son פַּרְעֹֽשׁ׃ <WH6551> of Parosh ס
